analysis.description:
BNB.startDate (/unique_chucks/31/0x409694d12ab1ee7cf7f45245aec9197644660683.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x409694d12ab1ee7cf7f45245aec9197644660683.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x409694d12ab1ee7cf7f45245aec9197644660683.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x409694d12ab1ee7cf7f45245aec9197644660683.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x409694d12ab1ee7cf7f45245aec9197644660683.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
